Lessons Learned: DCLT members are older, retired, and conservation-minded. Top values include land protection, water quality, and stewardship. Messaging should emphasize measurable impact, legacy giving, and passive engagement opportunities.

Communications are highly effective among long-term members, but acquisition and first-year retention are weaknesses. Members seek impact-driven updates on land, water, and stewardship. Messaging should segment newcomers vs. loyalists and support stronger onboarding.
